article_title: Chinese plane stokes South China Sea fire
article_text: Tensions in the South China Sea are ratcheted up once again as Beijing lands a plane on one of the disputed Spratley Islands, sparking a war of words in Asia and accusations in Washington. As Greg Torode reports, many analysts see the landing as a major step towards Chinese militarization in the area.
